* Model:   J12S
* Website:  <nowiki>[[http://www.twinhead.com.tw|www.twinhead.com.tw]]</nowiki>

* Oem:   Jet Schweiz IT AG
* Oem Model:   Jet J1200
* Oem Website:  <nowiki>[[http://www.jet.ch|www.jet.ch]]</nowiki>

* This Laptop is sold with Kubuntu 7.10 Amd64 preinstalled by <nowiki>[[http://www.revamp-it.ch|www.revamp-it.ch]]</nowiki>

=== Current Issues ===
Webcam and Memory``Stick Card``Reader don't work after installation, still trying to get them working!

=== Hardware details ===
* Screen: TFT 12.1" WXGA
* CPU: Mobile Intel Core 2 Duo T7250 2.0 GHz
* Memory: 1 GB SODIMM DDR-2 667 200pin 1.8 Volt Kingmax
* Harddisk: Toshiba MK1246 GSX 2.5" S-ATA 150 120 GB
* Optical Drive: DVD-Rewriter Ultra Slim LG GSA-U10N, 9.5mm
* Graphic: Intel 965GM + ICH8-M, PCI Express 16x, Directx 9
* Sound: Intel 82801H (ICH8 Family) HD Audio Controller 
* LAN: Via VT6120/VT6121/VT6122 Gigabit Ethernet Adapter 10/100/1000 MBit
* WLAN: Intel Pro/Wireless 3945 802.11a/b/g PCIe Mini card
* Bluetooth: Cambridge Silicon Radio, Bluetooth Dongle (HCI mode) USB2.0 + EDR 0a12:0001
* Modem: 56K V.90  High Definition Audio (HDA) Intel subdevice: Motorola Si3054  1057:3055
* USB: Intel 82801H (ICH8 Family) USB 2 EHCI Controller, 3 Connectors
* Firewire: O2 Micro (IEEE 1394)  1217:00f7
* Card Reader: O2 Micro Integrated MMC/SD Controller  1217:7120
* Card Reader: O2 Micro Integrated MS/xD Controller  1217:7130
* Webcam: Genesys Logic, USB2.0 PC Camera 05e3:0505
* Keyboard: Swiss German
* Touchpad
* Battery: Smart Li-Ion
